To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Interview with Rory Feek surrounding the release of his book "This Life I Live: One Man’s Extraordinary, Ordinary Life and the Woman Who Changed It Forever" from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 11, 2017. Interview conducted by Michael McCall. Includes audio from video and recorded audio excerpts.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
